title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Synchronous Dialogue-Based Online Language Education Design for Professional Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and familiarity with job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can construct and communicate natural dialogue of at least three sentences in job-related contexts within eight weeks.
Learners can compose professional emails using domain-specific terminology without grammatical errors.
Learners can perform at least one role-play of work scenarios through asynchronous text chat with peer learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
